_fixture_meta.description: Common error responses from Zoho Creator API

rate_limit.message: You have reached your API call limit for a minute
rate_limit.details: Maximum 50 API calls per minute exceeded

invalid_token.message: Authorization Failure. The access token is either invalid or has expired
invalid_token.details: Token needs to be refreshed or regenerated

expired_token.details: The access token has expired. Please refresh the token.

report_not_found.details: The specified report does not exist or is not accessible

form_not_found.details: The specified form does not exist or is not accessible

record_not_found.details: The specified record does not exist

permission_denied.details: User does not have the required API permissions

validation_failed.details: One or more field values are invalid

server_error.details: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

maintenance_mode.details: The service is under maintenance. Please try again later.

quota_exceeded.details: You have exceeded your API usage quota for this period

file_too_large.details: The uploaded file is too large. Maximum file size is 50MB.

invalid_file_type.details: The file type is not supported for this field
